data.name: GlobalPvp_Text_Hold_Burst_Description
data.value: Configure a hotkey to manually hold burst abilities in PvP. When active, burst cooldowns are saved and only basic attacks will be used.

data.name: GlobalPvp_Text_Warmachina_Description
data.value: Warmachina are NPCs in PvP (Ravens, Falcons, Striking Dummies, Icebound Tomeliths, etc.). By default, burst abilities are saved when targeting them. Enable the checkbox above to allow burst on Warmachina.

data.name: GlobalPvp_Text_Hold_Burst_Overlay_Note
data.value: Note: The 'Hold PVP Burst' toggle also appears in the main settings overlay when PVP mode is active, and can be toggled manually there as well.

data.name: Views_ToolTip_Check_to_move_and_resize_the_combat_
data.value: Check to move and resize the combat message overlay. Uncheck when done.

data.name: Astrologian_Content_Use_Time_Till_Death_For_Damage
data.value: Use Time Till Death For Damage Over Time Spells

data.name: Astrologian_ToolTip_Causes_Lightspeed_Earthstar_an
data.value: Causes Lightspeed, Earthstar, and Macrocosmos to be used on cooldown in most cases for additional DPS (generally super wasteful).

data.name: Astrologian_Text_AoE_Heal_When_Allies_Need_Healing
data.value: AoE Heal When Allies Need Healing -

data.name: Astrologian_ToolTip_This_will_automatically_cast_f
data.value: This will automatically cast for Tankbusters. Does not work if Exaltation is disabled.

data.name: Astrologian_ToolTip_This_will_automatically_cast_C
data.value: This will automatically cast Collective Unconscious for AOEs. Does not work if Lightspeed is disabled.

data.name: Astrologian_ToolTip_This_will_automatically_cast_M
data.value: This will automatically cast Macrocosmos for Big AOEs. Does not work if Lightspeed is disabled.

data.name: Astrologian_ToolTip_This_will_automatically_cast_N
data.value: This will automatically cast Neutral Sect and Aspected Helios for Big AOEs if Macrocosmos Fight Logic is enabled but unavailable. Does not work if Neutral Sect is disabled.

data.name: Astrologian_ToolTip_This_will_automatically_cast_L
data.value: This will automatically cast Lightspeed for Big AOEs if Macrocosmos and Neutral Sect FightLogic are enabled but unavailable. Does not work if Lightspeed is disabled.

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_Occult_Crescent_content_provid
data.value: Occult Crescent content provides temporary Phantom Jobs with unique abilities.

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_Magitek_automatically_detects_
data.value: Magitek automatically detects your current Phantom Job and uses abilities accordingly.

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_Party_buff_refresh_time_contro
data.value: Party buff refresh time controls when to reapply long-duration buffs near Knowledge Crystals.

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_In_combat_Uses_SwiftcastDualca
data.value: In combat: Uses Swiftcast/Dualcast only. Out of combat: Uses Swiftcast first, then slowcast if needed.

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_When_near_Knowledge_Crystals_a
data.value: When near Knowledge Crystals, automatically switches to enabled phantom jobs to cast party buffs if needed. Disable specific jobs you don't have access to.

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_when_target_targeting_us_and_HP_below
data.value: when target targeting us and HP below

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_Grouped_abilities_share_restri
data.value: Grouped abilities share restrictions as noted.

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_Quick_prioritizes_casting_part
data.value: Quick prioritizes casting party members. Comet restriction uses Dualcast (RDM), Requiescat (PLD), Occult Quick (Time Mage), or Swiftcast (if enabled).

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_Unicorn_creates_40k_damage_abs
data.value: Unicorn creates 40k damage absorb barrier for entire party. Falcon triggers traps.

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_yalms_of_target_Vigilance_Fore
data.value: yalms of target (Vigilance â†’ Foreseen Offense when entering combat)

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_Vigilance_can_only_be_cast_out
data.value: Vigilance can only be cast out of combat with a valid target. Effect changes to Foreseen Offense (+60% crit rate) when entering combat.

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_percent_HP_physical_damage_imm
data.value: percent HP (physical damage immunity for one attack)

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_Mineuchi_avoids_stunning_immun
data.value: Mineuchi avoids stunning immune enemies. Zeninage only works when you have an Occult Coffer. Iainuki is a cone AoE attack.

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_Predict_cycles_through_4_rando
data.value: Predict cycles through 4 random predictions. Magitek will attempt to use the best prediction available as they cycle through. Only one can be used. Must cast something on 4th cycle to avoid False Prediction (deadly DoT).

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text__SAFETY_If_Starfall_is_the_4rd
data.value: âš ï¸ SAFETY: If Starfall is the 4rd prediction and you're below the Starfall threshold, the current prediction will be cast automatically to avoid being forced into deadly Starfall as the 4th prediction.

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_percent_HP_90_max_HP_self_dama
data.value: percent HP (90% max HP self damage!)

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_Battle_Bell_prioritizes_tanks_
data.value: Battle Bell prioritizes tanks first (who take most damage), then self, then other party members. Only cast in combat.

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_Weather_effects_are_beneficial
data.value: Weather effects are beneficial buffs that can only be cast in combat when available. All effects are applied to self and nearby party members.

data.name: OccultCrescent_Text_Dokumori_is_an_AoE_steal_abili
data.value: Dokumori is an AoE steal ability for gold farming. Only uses gold farming mode with 2+ enemies - single target scenarios use normal rotation for ninki gauge benefits. Only works when playing as Ninja job. Enable 'multiple targets only' to save Dokumori cooldown for big AoE pulls.

data.name: OccultCrescent_Content_Enable_Occult_Crescent_Phan
data.value: Enable Occult Crescent Phantom Job System

data.name: OccultCrescent_Content_Automatically_switch_phanto
data.value: Automatically switch phantom jobs for Knowledge Crystal buffs

data.name: OccultCrescent_Content_Restore_original_phantom_jo
data.value: Restore original phantom job after auto-buffing

data.name: OccultCrescent_Content_Use_Romeos_Ballad_Combat_in
data.value: Use Romeo's Ballad (Combat interrupts only - knowledge crystal usage is automatic)

data.name: OccultCrescent_Content_Use_Pray_Combat_regen_only_
data.value: Use Pray (Combat regen only - knowledge crystal party buff is automatic)

data.name: OccultCrescent_Content_Use_Counterstance_Combat_pa
data.value: Use Counterstance (Combat parry buff only - knowledge crystal movement speed is automatic)

data.name: OccultCrescent_Content_Use_Deadly_Blow_High_damage
data.value: Use Deadly Blow (High damage based on missing HP)

data.name: OccultCrescent_Content_Use_Holy_Cannon_More_damage
data.value: Use Holy Cannon (More damage vs undead)

data.name: OccultCrescent_Content_Use_Silver_Cannon_Damage_de
data.value: Use Silver Cannon (Damage debuff) - Mutually exclusive

data.name: OccultCrescent_Content_Use_Shock_Cannon_Inflicts_p
data.value: Use Shock Cannon (Inflicts paralysis) - Mutually exclusive

data.value: Use Occult Quick (Speed buff for cast/recast/movement)

data.value: Use Occult Slowga (Inflicts Slow on enemies)

data.value: Use Occult Mage Masher (Reduces enemy magic attack power)

data.name: OccultCrescent_Content_Use_Occult_Dispel_Removes_b
data.value: Use Occult Dispel (Removes beneficial effects from enemies)

data.name: OccultCrescent_Content_Use_Occult_Comet_AoE_damage

data.name: OccultCrescent_Content_Use_Iainuki_Cone_attack_wit
data.value: Use Iainuki (Cone attack with instant kill chance)

data.name: OccultCrescent_Content_Use_Zeninage_Consumes_Occul
